metadata.title: CVE-2020-7045 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - low
metadata.description: In Wireshark 3.0.x before 3.0.8, the BT ATT dissector could crash. This wasaddressed in epan/dissectors/packet-btatt.c by validating opcodes.

criterions.comment: wireshark: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
